## ScriptHostOptions.unresponsiveInterval property

Optionally specifies the interval, in milliseconds, that must elapse since the last message was received from the underlying sandbox to consider is unresponsive

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
unresponsiveInterval?: number;
```

## Remarks

The default is twice the value of `pingInterval`<!-- -->.
